name: Mizuki But They Throw Balls
description:
The wackiest minigame in town! 🏀 Join the fabulous Akiyama Mizuki on a hoop-tastic adventure where they transform into the ultimate basketball maestro. 🎵🏀 
Mizuki, armed with their dazzling vocal cords and a bunch of basketballs, is on a mission to score the most epic baskets ever.
